mapper.sql: sid, mtitle, mlocalpath, premotepath, anonymoustid, anonymouspass, mfilename, supervisortid, supervisorpass

mapper.update:
update midterm
mtitle = #{mtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mlocalpath = #{mlocalpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
premotepath = #{premotepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
anonymoustid = #{anonymoustid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
anonymouspass = #{anonymouspass,jdbcType=BIT},
mfilename = #{mfilename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supervisortid = #{supervisortid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
supervisorpass = #{supervisorpass,jdbcType=BIT},
anonymoustcomment = #{anonymoustcomment,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
supervisortcommment = #{supervisortcommment,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update midterm set mtitle = #{mtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mlocalpath = #{mlocalpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, premotepath = #{premotepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, anonymoustid = #{anonymoustid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, anonymouspass = #{anonymouspass,jdbcType=BIT}, mfilename = #{mfilename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supervisortid = #{supervisortid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, supervisorpass = #{supervisorpass,jdbcType=BIT}, anonymoustcomment = #{anonymoustcomment,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, supervisortcommment = #{supervisortcommment,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
